      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        从类复制的说明: android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        Perform initialization of all fragments and loaders.
        覆盖:
        onCreate 在类中 android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
        参数:
        savedInstanceState - If the activity is being re-initialized after previously being shut down then this Bundle contains the data it most recently supplied in Activity.onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle). Note: Otherwise it is null.
        另请参阅:
        Activity.onStart(), Activity.onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle), Activity.onRestoreInstanceState(android.os.Bundle), Activity.onPostCreate(android.os.Bundle)

      • onResume

        protected void onResume()
        从类复制的说明: android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        Dispatch onResume() to fragments. Note that for better inter-operation with older versions of the platform, at the point of this call the fragments attached to the activity are not resumed. This means that in some cases the previous state may still be saved, not allowing fragment transactions that modify the state. To correctly interact with fragments in their proper state, you should instead override FragmentActivity.onResumeFragments().
        覆盖:
        onResume 在类中 android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        另请参阅:
        Activity.onRestoreInstanceState(android.os.Bundle), Activity.onRestart(), Activity.onPostResume(), Activity.onPause()

      • onPause

        protected void onPause()
        从类复制的说明: android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        Dispatch onPause() to fragments.
        覆盖:
        onPause 在类中 android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        另请参阅:
        Activity.onResume(), Activity.onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle), Activity.onStop()

      • onStop

        protected void onStop()
        从类复制的说明: android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        Dispatch onStop() to all fragments. Ensure all loaders are stopped.
        覆盖:
        onStop 在类中 android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
        另请参阅:
        Activity.onRestart(), Activity.onResume(), Activity.onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle), Activity.onDestroy()

      • finish

        public void finish()
        从类复制的说明: android.app.Activity
        Call this when your activity is done and should be closed. The ActivityResult is propagated back to whoever launched you via onActivityResult().
        覆盖:
        finish 在类中 android.app.Activity
